title: Enchantment Spells
content: , Sorcerer, Wizard Tasha's Hideous Laughter Lv 1 Enchantment ActionSpell Slot Leve a creture Prone with laughter, without the ability to get up.10 turnsThe creature must have an Intelligence of 5 or more.The target can try to shake off the effect each time it takes damage. 18mWIS SaveConcentration Bard, Eldritch Knight, Wizard, Sorcerer Calm Emotions Lv 2 Enchantment ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Suppress strong emotions in an area, making all humanoids immune to being Charmed or Frightened.10 turnsR
